website_summaries.verdict: Impressive foot peel that gets the job done and leaves your feet feeling baby soft.
pros: Multiple layers of dry, dead skin peel off without scrubbing
For optimum results, we highly recommend soaking your feet for 10 minutes every day after use
cons: skin starts peeling 2 to 5 days after use
Booties are too small for some
Both packs may be needed to get the job done

customer_reviews.title: it certainly works - freaky, yet effective!
customer_reviews.text: My poor feet have been extremely neglected ever since I was pregnant 2 years ago. This was the first time I really ever had very rough, hard heels and 'old' looking feet; so bad, I didn't even want to have a pedicure or wear sandals. Anyway, these foot peels were super easy to use and boy are they effective. It was the fourth day that my feet began to peel - very strange! Totally painless. The new skin coming through was very soft, like new. I would totally recommend. My sister and mother have requested their boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Ally CHR

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Me and my wife both tried this out and it works just as they say. It took only 4 days for my feet to start peeling. Words of advice soak your feet for 10-30 minutes everyday after using it to help loose your dead skin.
customer_reviews.author: Gibson’s

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: My feet have never felt softer! I do recommend wearing socks often, otherwise your couch and blankets will be covered in sloughed off skin!They’re still peeling but I wanted to write my review. It comes with 2 pairs but I only needed one so I let my boyfriend use it. He was really happy with results also! We’re buying another pair for maintenance lol. Important to do the soaks it definitely helps! No pain or discomfort. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Works as described, takes awhile for skin to peel off (3-6 days after use) but it definitely reveals fresh new “baby” skin!
customer_reviews.author: steph1317

customer_reviews.title: poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The reason why I give it one star: not even ten mins after putting the booties on they started to leak in the front where your toes are. I will update my review and add a star if there’s even enough liquid left to make my feet peel. Idk if I got a bad batch or if it’s just poorly made. Guess I should’ve just bought the name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ross James

customer_reviews.title: Sliky soft feet
customer_reviews.text: These were amazing! They actually did what they claimed they would. My feet were peeling in 5 days. Starting on the third day I made sure to soak them for at least 10 minutes. Took about 3-4 days for them to stop peeling but the results are amazing. My feet feel so new!
customer_reviews.author: Nov.Rein

customer_reviews.title: Nasty feet won’t be fixed with just one treatment. Be real.
customer_reviews.text: Anyone giving this product low scores isn’t using them with the right expectations. I’ve always had callouses all over my heels and big toes. Directions say if you don’t see results with the first set, reapply one week later. I wasn’t seeing results in week one so I went ahead and did week 2 today. I didn’t wash my feet prior to the second treatment and because my situation is extreme I left them on for 1.5 hours. Just showered and noticed a lot of peeling after the second treatment. I didn’t presume that one treatment would give me 3 year old boy skin but after two I definitely am on my way. Just ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Music nerd

customer_reviews.title: do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend this item. My right foot started to burn after 45 minutes so I removed the booties. My right foot was inflamed. I still have a large bruise-like mark on my right foot. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: James Cory

customer_reviews.title: What a mess!
customer_reviews.text: Buy the original-Baby Foot! When I opened the inner package of the first pair, there was a leak in one or both bag(s). There was not much liquid in either bag, and it was dripping out. Unlike Baby Foot, which has a gel-like substance, this product is totally liquid, therefore much messier. The adhesive tabs were wet and would not hold. I am using the product now with socks over the bags, and a towel to protect my wood floor. Hopefully the limited amount of product in the bags will still work after all the messiness I’ve dealt with.
customer_reviews.author: bead girl

customer_reviews.title: Simply Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! After day 8, my feet are peeling and boy oh boy, what an amazing product. I was starting to think it wasn’t going to happen, but patience paid off. I have been getting bi-weekly pedicures since forever, so I thought my feet were in excellent shape. But peeling away this layer of old skin was fascinating. It did not hurt at all. It peeled around my toes, even the top of my toes and most of the top of my foot. I’m sure if I had applied more of the soak on top it would have been a better peel. This product is amazing!! Plus I still have a second pair for later.
customer_reviews.author: Camera Girl

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money on cheaper brand.  This is THE one.
customer_reviews.text: I left them on for 90-minutes. 3- days, about a 10 minute peel and done. Smooth feet. Recommend that you keep your feet moisturizing during and after. You remove several layers of skin you’ve removed your natural moisture barrier. Bag and tag them sock and Vaseline for spectacular results. Keep them moisturized. I tend to be frugal to a fault. These are the best foot peel masks I’ve used. They won’t do a lot on the tops of your feet but soles heels foot ball and toes, dead skin gone. Happy feet.
customer_reviews.author: ZenLala

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best products to remove hard skin of feet
customer_reviews.text: I had tried many other tools, products and nothing seems to fix completely the ugliness of hard skin in my feet, this product removed it complete... my feet are soft as a baby. You wear the plastic boots with the liquid inside, then wash them and then WAIT for 5-7 days! You at first think how this is going to start working, if I don’t see any difference in day one, or 2 or 3.... BUT it does, it works and your skin starts to peal by the ton. Make sure to do it while before any event in which you will be showing your feet, you do not want anyone to see the peeling process 🤢
customer_reviews.author: AdHer

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed!
customer_reviews.text: I really didn’t think this would work but six days after I used it, I was amazed!
customer_reviews.author: Chestnutbelle

customer_reviews.title: Raw, Real, and Riveting
customer_reviews.text: I was a tad skeptical upon my purchase. I looked high and low for something to work like this product did. I read all the reviews. I looked at all the photos. I was ready for its magic to work on me. I did a moisturizing foot mask a few days before to prepare my feet for the change that was going to happen. My feet started to peel with in 24 hours. My feet are brand new! I will 100% repurchase these. The only thing I would ad to this process would be aloe socks to keep your feet moisturized while catching all of the skin.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Eww
customer_reviews.text: I exfoliate and scrape the dead skin off my feet frequently, yet this foot mask peeled off another layer. It’s simple follow the directions in the box. My feet took about 5 days to start peeling. It’s kind of gross but it does exactly what it’s supposed to. Make sure you soak your feet 10-20 min a day after using the booties. Soaking helps it peel faster and easier. Definitely ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Jae Antt

customer_reviews.title: Works great as long as you don’t force peeling progression!
customer_reviews.text: My feet are sloughing off layers upon layers of dead skin. I finally got rid of my nasty fungus about 6 weeks ago, and after using this my feet feel wonderfully soft where all of the dead skin has come off! A word of advice, do NOT try to expedite the peeling by pulling and plucking at the skin. If the loose pieces of skin are uncomfortable and/or annoying, use nail clippers to snip them close to the part of skin still attached to your foot. Do not use force to remove any bits that haven’t fallen off.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: I’m the biggest skeptic out there!! This REALLY works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t gotten a pedicure in years and the skin on my feet was becoming too tough for even pumice to break through. After 3 days of using this product (make sure U do the foot soak every day or it won’t be as effective) my tough skin started peeling away!!! A godsend i tell u!!! Didn’t think it would work for me but it did!! Love my new feet:)
customer_reviews.author: Cynnamon

customer_reviews.title: Not only does this not work, but it leaves your feet looking WORSE than before!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolute trash. I've used foot peels by other brands before with great results, but this one unfortunately is horrible. I used it almost 2 weeks ago and I have yet to have ANY peeling whatsoever! None! Instead my feet look so dry and crusty and ashy you'd think I've been using my heels to stop my car like Fred Flinstone. It's really that bad. The most frustrating part is that I don't even have extremely dry feet! I was just looking to spruce up my feet before the spring and now I'm left in worse shape than before. I will be returning the one unused pair of masks because they clearly do not work. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: So, this sort of works. It isn’t very strong, and mostly just left my feet feeling uncomfortably dry. It peels, but not nearly as much as it should. Personally, I will never deviate from Baby Foot again.
customer_reviews.author: Vaelorn

customer_reviews.title: Super peel
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical that this would work. It is cumbersome and messy to wear the bags on your feet for an hour but as some reviews say , you can just put socks on over and tape it shut. Then you have to wait a whole week and then it's not just like a little peel, it's a massive peel. See picture attached. this can be cumbersome if you want to wear sandals or get your nails done Etc. I only give these three stars because of the time it takes and the fact that your whole foot peels off. It's impossible not to pull out the skin too.
customer_reviews.author: JackieB

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! It peels little bit little each day i was so embarrassed i had to cover my feet in mid summer!! Looked like a had son weird feet disease.. hate it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I tried the first application 8 days ago and have ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried the first application 8 days ago and have been soaking my feet faithfully daily and nothing has peeled. I have the second application on my feet and am praying that it works. I will update if I get positive results. UPDATE: I changed it from 1 Star to 5 stars. After my second application my feet started peeling like crazy. It totally work my feet happened to be rough since I haven’t had a pedicure in years.
customer_reviews.author: Author Kamika Graham

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because as my husband likes to say, I have flintstone feet because If I can help it, id go without shoes. For the really REALLLY deep hard calluses, they didn't even touch them for everything else it worked wonders. I would give the advise of DONT PICK IT! I'm a picker and I totally peeled it and I think it didn't work as well as it would have, if I had left it alone. I love that it comes with two sets. The reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is that the tops of my feet are STILL somewhat peeling and its been 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Hated it
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited about these based on buzzfeed n reviews. Followed instructions religiously. First week: nothing. Not one peel. Did 2nd pack n this time it flaked my feet up, but not in any peelable fashion. Instructions say to not peel until coming off. Looked like foot dandruff for a week until i gave up n pumiced my feet. After pumicing it did get my 2nd worst issues (deep wear on my pads) but not my biggest (flaking big toes). Nothing hurt minus near the big toe. But for $20 dang bucks u thing itd work a lot better
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Who needs a nail shop pedi when I can do it myself!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this product. This has helped my feet so much. At first I was worried it wasn’t working but I took a bath the other days and when I got out my skin was loose and started peeling. I agree with everyone to let your foot soak longer than the ten minutes recommended. Also use nice hot water. Not to hot, not to cool. It helps a lot. My kids are grossed out but also thought it was cool.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique A

customer_reviews.title: Your feel will look disgusting while peeling!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hurt as long as you don’t force the peeling yourself and is pretty easy. My husband and I did it together and we didn’t use the tape but slipped socks on over the little booties. My feet are still peeling about 2 weeks later and my husband has done it 2 times now. He is even more pleased than I am. His feet were very bad in terms of dry skin that always looked crusty. He wears an 11.5 shoe and didn’t have issue with the boot fitting him. Will probably buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Holly P

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Well, here I am reporting two weeks later...and my feet are still peeling. And yes, they have been soaked every day since. I'm not picking or peeling the skin as the instructions stated and that's caused me to look like I'm walking around with feet post sunburn. My heels which have peeled, are still as hard as they were which caused me to take a pumice to them like i normally would have. Would love to know where everyone is finding their new "baby soft" feet. Pretty bummed. Was hoping this would at least help a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Chel C

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time if you’re wanting softer feet
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this did make my feet peel. However, the skin underneath was not any softer. This was just an inconvenience, really. Skin gets everywhere if you’re not wearing socks 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Deliciously gross :)
customer_reviews.text: I think I wore the booties last Thursday night and have tried to soak my feet most days since. Today is Monday and the party really got started. A whole swathe of skin has already come off and it looks like there's more to come. My heels were pretty bad so it looks like I'll definitely need to use the second pack - instructions say that can be done after a week from initial application. I've tried a lot of different foot products and I'm excited about keeping this in the regular routine.
customer_reviews.author: Clarice

customer_reviews.title: Decent, not as good as babyfoot
customer_reviews.text: These are fine, and do the job but I felt like although I followed not just the packaged directions, but user directions on YouTube and blogs - plus my own personal experience with babyfoot, these just aren’t as strong and the peeling in the important parts was satisfactory but the rest of the foot didn’t peel as cleanly so now I have a half exfoliated peeling upper foot that just looks like an annoying sunburn. Soaked several times, no difference. Just not as strong as babyfoot but does the job - not bad for the price, I guess comparatively but waiting for someone else to come around and do a better job! :)
customer_reviews.author: V.W.

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: I've heard about this type of product for years and finally decided to try. It was easy to use and exactly one week later my feet began to peel. My toe nails lost their dingy coloring from being painted and I was left with soft feet. It didn't make all my foot imperfections disappear, but it was a start. Be prepared for a lot of flaking skin. The peeling process took more than a week. I'll use this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Brown

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical but it works
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about it when I bought it, but my heels had such touch hard skin I wanted to try something. I havne't soaked my feet at all, but they've peeled. First week I wore the little booties on saturday, they peeled thursday when my feet sweat at work. This second time I don't remember, it was saturday or sunday, and they've started to peel on tuesday. I'm happy with he product so far. Nice soft fresh skin after they peeled both times.
customer_reviews.author: afd33

customer_reviews.title: Got big feet that are cracking?This gets itchy,BUT  WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This product should not be used if there is foot pain, or if you have open sores,because it IS an acid peel with a delayed action!My feet were hot like they were sunburnt for a couple of days,about four,as I recall.THEN the peeling began,Do follow the directions and soak your feet every day,it will help.There were two applications,but I have only used one so far because it’s wintertime here now and my feet are always covered. My feet were seriously like baby skin again though,after using the product!Took away all the cracked ,hard ,icky, stuff .Also,delighted they wrapped around my size TEN feet just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Imlilyroses

customer_reviews.title: Chemical burn? Maybe allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I had great expectations but got sore feet instead. I followed directions to the letter. I did feel some discomfort during the time the booties were on but it was tolerable. After I washed the goop off my feet felt super sensitive and hot. It got worse as the days went by. Feels and looks like a severe sunburn. I’m hoping this sensitivity gets better quick. I’m so sorry I tried this. And I’m really angry there were no warnings. Oh and in conclusion, no peeling occurred.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for my thick skin
customer_reviews.text: I have awful feet with very thick calloused skin on my heels and balls on my feet. IV can't even put.on pantyhose without the skin on my heels snagging and running the nylon. Good thing I prefer hunting boots to high heels. These worked well and in about 5 days my feet were peeling nicely. It definitely helped and made a noticeable improvement. I've used twice so far and will use them again. It doesn't peel in huge sheets like some people want you to believe, but some large pieces of shin come off. They are cheaper than the other popular brand, and work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amber MoralesTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love when a product delivers what it says it will deliver! My feet took a while to start peeling (like a full seven days), but I didn’t follow directions (I have no way to ‘soak’ my feet other than in a shower). Once they started to peel, I wore socks to keep the dead skin from showing up everywhere on our walk-to-wall carpeting. I can’t wait to use the second set included in this! My feet look and feel great! FYI, it is virtually impossible not to help peel off the dead skin yourself. Try to resist this as much as possible, although I think it will be futile....
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Very messy...
customer_reviews.text: Well, first impression... when I opened the bag to get the plastic booties out the entire thing was wet(I don’t know if that is normal). I cut the tops of the booties and put my feet in them and am now sitting in the same spot because they are so messing I dare not get up and walk around. So just be aware... you should be somewhere that you can be comfortable and don’t care about cleaning the floor up... I mean I have liquid in about a 2 foot area on my floor( I hope it doesn’t mess it up). My daughter said it smells like nail polish remover.... I’ll right another review once my 7 days pass...
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do what it said
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how this product has gotten so many positive reviews and those pictures with all of the peeling... I was excited to try this product and made sure I followed the instructions exactly as described. I saw no change at all. While it certainly didn’t harm my feet in any way, it also didn’t live up to the hype that people speak and I didn’t see any peeling of dead skin. Feeling a bit disappointed right now.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon Seely

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: It works somewhat. I did what the directions said and soaked everyday along with using lotion. It took about 6 days before I started seeing some peeling to start (very little). I was hoping the dead skin would come off in big chuncks mine is only peeling small amounts with not a whole lot of progress. I've been peeling the skin off myself after about 9 days. The new skin is very soft but I'm on day 11 with not much peeling on it's own so I'm helping it along by peeling and trying to get my feet looking good. This peeling should be done by now and It's kind of at a standstill by the back of my heels.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: I've bought this 5 times!
customer_reviews.text: According to my Amazon history I've bought this foot mask 5 times... it's just that good! My feet so incredible after the skin peels away. I'm grateful my calluses aren't too bad but I'm trying to take action from now to make sure they don't get any worse. I try to do this mask twice a month or once every couple of months depending on how my feet are feeling or if I can afford to have my feet peel for the next week. I've tried one another mask after using this one and it was garbage. My feet didn't even peel. Whatever they put in this one works well enough for my to come back 5 times!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted -- great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: I got a couple for my mom and myself to do "at home" spa day. The product comes with a couple of pouches where you put your feet in, and then seal with your feet soaking for an hour. It take a couple days to see the peeling effect, and it was a tiny bit itchy due to the dead skin lifting, but it works so well at removing all the dryness and dead skin from all over the feet. In between the toes, around the toenail, the calluses and the ankles. Worked exactly like I thought it would. Definitely want to get a few for stocking stuffers.
customer_reviews.author: _HeYo

customer_reviews.title: Off with the old to expose the new.
customer_reviews.text: Really does peel away the top layer of skin. If your expecting something like a snake skin shed to expose a soft foot all at once, that is not the deal. It causes skin peeling in segments, wherever the moisturizer had contact - under the foot, between the toes, behind the ankles, etc. Kind of gross and satisfying at the same time. Would find loose skin in my socks sometimes, so check your socks when you take 'em off. And definitely don't wear open-toed shoes or flip flops. Not a good look. But the means justify the end... for a couple of weeks at least.
customer_reviews.author: Onit

customer_reviews.title: No peeling
customer_reviews.text: i did exactly as directed and no results. I had some very light flakey marks on the bottom center of my foot for one day, but never had any peeling and applied the booties to my feet over 2 weeks ago. soaked for longer than 10 minutes every day. my feet are in fairly good shape, but i live in phoenix, air is very dry and i wear open toe shoes often, so was expecting some results. still have another pair, i'll try them again in a month to see if i get any results. if i do,i'll update this review
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Wardell Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Did not work- DO NOT recommend
customer_reviews.text: It’s been 4 1/2 days and not one flake of skin. I purchased based on the good reviews and pictures. I don’t have tough or sensitive feet, just average. I followed the instructions except maybe leaving it on 10 more minutes just to make sure I went the full time limit and not one flake of skin. Really disappointed. Maybe I bought a defective pair but either way I would not recommend. Kind of expensive for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer 1974

customer_reviews.title: Works well but could use improvement in bootie design
customer_reviews.text: The product got the job done and resulted in smooth feet after a couple of days of peeling. Took about 4 days to start peeling. The reason for 4 stars is I did not like the style of the booties. I’ve used other peels before that bring strings attached to tightly tie around the ankle to keep secure but I found this set up of using two stickers was not as secure. I actually spilled a bit in the process of putting them on.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie L

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Since I had 2 weeks off work I figured I have plenty of time to try this product out. I followed the directions exactly as described, even soaking my feet in warm water for 10 minutes every day. Now it has been 7 days since I first applied this product to my feet. Not only has this product NOT caused any dead skin to peel but now my feet are rougher than before I used this product. For me I seen zero results, not even a small flake of dead skin peeling. I can not recommend this product for use in my opinion. The only thing this product shed was money from my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Germain

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: These did absolutely NOTHING to our feet. Nothing!! My daughter and I both used one on the same day. It's now a week later, and not so much as a flake of skin. NOT ONE!! What a complete waste of time and money! I'm seriously livid that I dropped $20 on this, and have another box of them! You can bet you butt they are going back! Save your money. They suck!
customer_reviews.author: D. Brady

customer_reviews.title: This actually works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to buy a product like this, and was stressing out over which brand to buy, but after reading so many positive reviews I have in. Comes with 2 sets of booties. I used one and gave friend the other. In about 2 wks we both had super soft, clean and Callous free feet!! Must warn you that once you start peeling, maybe 3 days after you wear the booties, you must keep socks on at all times bc the shedding process is gross. Definitely don’t use right before an event that requires open toe shoes! My peeling lasted almost a full week. Highly recommend, especially with salons still closed!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Definitely will buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! It works! I did not expect it to work as well as it did!! Comes with 2 pairs. I used them 2 weeks apart. I soaked my feet inside the bags, waited 2-3days and my feet started peeling. No pain or discomfort. It was pretty gross/ yet satisfying seeing the skin peel off.. be prepared for dead skin .. EVERYWHERE though!! 🤢 keep your socks on whenever possible to avoid leaving a trail! My feet felt sooo soft! It was amazing! I used the 2nd pair thinking I wouldn’t see much this time around... WRONG! It made my feet peel again, leaving my feet extra soft!!
customer_reviews.author: Elenaaaa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome! It says keep on an hour but it's better if u do an hour and a half. It also has 2 little pieces of tape but I sealed the top with masking tape so none of the liquid spilled out. I thought after a couple days it didn't work then a week later i look down and my foot had a huge piece of dead skin on it. I pulled it off. It doesn't hurt and isn't deep. I pulled off the whole bottom of my foot in one piece. It takes awhile to do but is fascinating. The toes come off like little gloves. Well worth it and your feet feel so delicate and soft after
customer_reviews.author: Pittsburgh girl

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Feet for Less!
customer_reviews.text: I take pretty good care of my feet but through I would try it out since I don’t do regular pedicures. I never knew my feet had so much extra skin. Within 4 days I had flaky pieces all in my bed, on the floor and in my shoes. I have to say I dealt with this for a week. I went and got a pedicure since I was headed out of town and the stylist asked me if I ever had a pedicure. I’m in love with this product my feet have never felt so soft. I literally have baby feet.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: On 3rd day, peeling has started
customer_reviews.text: Im writing this review out of excitement, as I know I should wait longer. I did this for aprox 70 mins on Thursday the 16th, today is Sunday the 19th and my left foot already started peeling! I have been keeping my feet moist by applying moisturizing creams + socks. I will update this review in a couple of days. CONS: the "socks/boots" the product comes in are extremely difficult to work around. Choose a movie to watch and bring extra tape to make sure the product doesnt spill. Video submitted on Monday 20th.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Mariel Cabrera Veloz

customer_reviews.title: SOFT feet!
customer_reviews.text: You'll have soft feet within 2 weeks! I recommend soaking your feet before you put the footies on. Hang out for an hour then wash the magic sauce off, soak your feet again and relax. It takes like 5ish days then your feet will start shedding.. It's fascinating. I definitely picked the skin off like a kid covering their paws in glue like back in the day. Picking it off vs not picking off doesn't produce different results so enjoy! I do this like once every 6 months. Pedicures make me anxious, I'm very ticklish. This is a great alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work as well as described! I tried the second applications it still didn't remove the dead skin as advertised! I didn't believe it will work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps you need to soak daily to see more results.
customer_reviews.text: I saw there were many people with great reviews. I’m not sure if I didn’t leave on long enough but I did leave it for exactly 1hour. It took 4 days to see some results. However I only had a small patch on only one foot. Perhaps I don’t have a lot of dead skin. Perhaps. I’ll review again when I do the second patch. Maybe it will take me longer. I will try the soaking of the feet each day to see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works, I did follow the recommendation of using one and the second a week later, only because my feet were really bad. It does take a couple days for your feet to start peeling, it even gets the cracking heel part of your feet, anyone that has this issues knows that it is layers of dead skin on your heals..... it is gone, all of it. It has been about 2 weeks from the first packet, and it is about done. My feet are amazing again, you will not be disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle alseth

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully effective BUT peeling takes longer than advertised
customer_reviews.text: OK so they’re not the most comfortable just because I don’t buy them to be comfortable! I wish I could write some thing like effectiveness and if I could I would give it five stars. These take time to peel a little longer than you expect I think that my feet continued peeling all the way for 14 days or longer so don’t do this before a trip thinking that you won’t peel the whole time you’re traveling but they work right and my feet are super smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Destini

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I was about to be super disappointed in this but it took a week to start peeling, definitely made my feet worse before making them better. It is also cold where I currently live and space heaters are very drying, as well as my skin doesnt see to exfoliate fast any way, about a week and a half later my feet are still peeling. Also I didnt soak my feet like suggested, ibwork 2 jobs and just didnt want to bother with it so took some extra time in the shower
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Keep soaking
customer_reviews.text: In the summer we are mostly in sandals and barefoot, which leads to dry and cracked heels. Using this foot mask and soaking in warm each day for about a week transforms your feet back to baby soft. Just follow the directions and you will be amazed how it sloughs off the thick/dead skin.
customer_reviews.author: fragsinvt

customer_reviews.title: I'm straight up not having a good time.
customer_reviews.text: There was no satisfying peeling going on over here... I followed the directions well, but it's been over a month and my skin is still gross and flaking off in spots. The reviews made it sound like your skin peels off like the glue you let dry on your hand in grade school, to reveal fresh smooth baby skin underneath. But instead I have just had patches of skin get loose and flake off all over the house, only to reveal more of the same. Make it stop!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Will not be using this in Summer....or maybe every again
customer_reviews.text: The treatment was easy enough- sit with your feet in the plastic booties for an hour. I bathed the next morning and when I got out I noticed a small amount skin bubbling up on both heels. it resembled a blister in appearance. I thought wow that was much faster than the 3-5 days. Nothing else happened for a week! Now 10 days since having done the treatment small areas of my skin are pealing. It looks gross and I don't feel comfortable wearing flip flops....its Summer! I am aware this product will work different per user but I am not happy with how it worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline G.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: At day three I was really ready to write the meanest most horrible results ever. And I took a shower that night and I don't know why I was drying my feet off and I noticed there was some skin on the crease of my foot and I thought that's weird so I just rinsed off again and then I realized my entire feet were peeling off and it was so soft underneath I could not believe it! These are pretty great and they do exactly what they say they're going to do.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S. McGough

customer_reviews.title: Well it definitely works...
customer_reviews.text: So when you first get the box you find these little plastic footies inside. You cut them open and then have to place your feet in this cold slimy goop for an hour. The next day nothing happened and I thought that it wasnt gonna work but boy was I wrong. The next day it looked like I had a full sock of dead skin ready to peel off my foot (your feet will feel very raw and sensitive with the new skin). My feet just kept peeling excessively!! I'm sitting there watching TV and pulling massive peels of skin off. It's quite disgusting but now my feet feel soft. This product works but it's a commitment.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I expected too much?
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I had my hopes TOO high after reading the reviews. I’m not saying it doesn’t work, it does! My experience was just not what happened to other people. My feet peeled for about two weeks straight, and that would be great if it wasn’t for the fact that it was in patches. It peeled so unevenly that when one part of the foot was soft, the other was already dry and hard. It also didn’t peel as much as I thought it would. Maybe my feet were too messed up? I still have the other set, which I will try using again to see if the results are different this time.
customer_reviews.author: Angie R

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than expected
customer_reviews.text: My feet really did peel. They started peeling 6 days after use. It was so weird, it even peeled between my toes. Be prepared for lots of peeling if your feet are very dry and crackled like mine. After I showered I took a dry towel and rubbed them good, but don't pick at your feet or it will damage them... I put lotion on after that. Also I tanned the 2nd day after use and the bottom of my feet burned so be very cautious if exposed to sun or when using a tanning bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: It’s good but not great
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product to make you shed the outer skin layer of your feet. Harder parts of my feet, like the hard skin of my big toe, or the outer edge of my feet, didn’t improve much. I am satisfied with the price- 15$ for 2 pairs of boots is great deal. I used one pair and saving the other to do it in a month or so. Soaking feet helps, but as I said I was really hoping that the hard parts of my feet (almost like calluses) would be gone.. Oh well..
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine foot peel!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received in on Wednesday & applied right away. Box has two, separately packaged pairs. Place your feet on a towel (so your floor wont get messy) as I had lots of liquid like stuff in the booties. Once the feet were in, i had no tingling, burning or other weird sensation. Top edges will not stick so (if u want), get two pieces of tape ready to keep them closed up. After about 1 hr i rinsed with soapy water. Saw some peeling on Saturday but on Sunday, major peeling! My heels are on the slow end but hopefully will get with the program ;)
customer_reviews.author: Katarzyna

customer_reviews.title: Please read
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use it this, i used it as instructed and my feet started to peel within a few days and were extremely soft. Not everywhere on my foot was as soft but that was expected. After about a month my feet started to randomly peel. Now it’s summer and I’m stuck with dry peeling feet. It is a good product to use during a time where you won’t be wearing sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Eamon

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to rid your feet of the surface dead skin, this is the product to do it! Super easy to follow instructions. It didn’t leave my feet moisturized or even super soft, but I didn’t expect it to. I expected it to cause the dead skin to slough off and I’ll just let the pics speak for themselves.... (Note: this works over 7 days; initially the loose skin comes off around the toes. Allow a week to pass for the full foot to exfoliate)
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Simmons

customer_reviews.title: This Works!!
customer_reviews.text: Normally I don't like doing reviews, but this product works!!! I followed the instructions and put the plastic boots on with the gel. After 3 days I couldn't believe my eye, dead skin from calluses started to peel away. I was a little scared when I saw the results. The peeling continues for a few days so be prepared...soak feet in warm water and let it peel naturally. I would highly recommend this product, and am a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Gray

customer_reviews.title: Miracle mask
customer_reviews.text: I'm 71 and I have struggled with dry calloused soles for years. I have tried everything and nothing has been very helpful. One application of this mask, and after 3 days the soles of my feet thick callouses and all came flaking off. It took them days to peel off--like a serious sun burn would peel in the days before we knew better--and what was left was smooth, soft, comfortable skin. Even my shoes felt more comfortable to wear. Truly a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rieder

customer_reviews.title: Sad Mistake
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used baby foot brand several times but decided to switch it up. What a horrible mistake! This is now day 10 since my initial booty soak and my feet are still “peeling” and by that I mean shedding these potato chip-esque ashy flakes. All of this would be fine except now the sole of my foot has decided to begin peeling several layers too deep so I have a fleshy spot. I will be trashing my second pair of booties.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Weeks

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me in removing sheets of skin from my feet
customer_reviews.text: I applied this to my feet Fri night. Followed the easy to understand directions. I am on day 3 and noticed they are starting to peel. Soaked my feet in warm water tonight as directed and the skin started coming off in sheets. I get a monthly pedicure so i was surprised on how much skin has been removed so far. I would say they are 75 percent peeled in just 3 days. The box says between 3 to 7 days.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hartman

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have, try at least once.
customer_reviews.text: Omg when I say I have new feet 🙌🏾🙌🏾👏🏾👏🏾👏🏾, after years of getting pedicures biweekly I developed a callus on the heels of my feet. I know the box say don’t pull the skin but I couldn’t help it🤷🏾‍♀️. The hanging skin was bothering me 🤣🤣. After 5 days my feet began to peel, I will be using the second pair in 2 weeks I still have the calluses but it’s much better and my feet aren’t finishing peeling yet. My Feet are baby soft and I’m so pleased, I might give these out as stocking stuffers for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole29

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome! Satisfying and disgusting!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome!! Ive used this product 3 times and each time it has worked as it says! This picture is day 4, it will do its thing if left alone and you will have soft feet. I do not have badly dry feet, just want mine as soft as my babies :) If you have really rough feet I'd recommend doing a few times back to back, when done peeling. So Satisfying and disgusting at the same time..Tip: wear socks everyday for about 10 days..so much peeling!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs*MamaA

customer_reviews.title: Just horrible all around
customer_reviews.text: I've never gotten such a bad pair of masks/socks. It's just like wrapping plastic wrap around my foot except it doesnt stick. The socks dont even hardly touch your feet they're so short. The tape to help it mold around your feet doesnt stick or stay. We pulled the socks out of the packaging and most of the liquid/solution just poured straight out despite the fact that we hadn't even cut the sock "open." VERY DISSATISFIED. DONT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Meh, at best
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I have no clue who comes up with the rating subcategories. The foot peel does not really work. It's meh, at best. I used baby foot and it was great. However, it is pricey. I decided to get this one to save money but I guess you get what you pay for. My feet did peel, but it was more like shedding on tiny little pieces, it took forever, it was annoying, and it looked ugly and uneven. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Baby Foot brand in the past with wonderful results, however, I thought I would save some money and buy this one. Mistake. This is not the one to get. It took a week before any peeling was noted. Still, after 2 weeks, I cannot remove the peeling skin. It looks as though my feet are molting at a very very slow rate. If you want to walk around with itty bitty pieces of skin on your feet - unable to really peel it off - then this is for you. It's not meant for me. I will go back to Baby Foot where the peeling and results are much better.
customer_reviews.author: 2Feathers

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t think they was working but then 7 days later it started coming off my feet in sheets- just like pictured. I would recommend soaking your feet first before use - I did mine in the shower and that was enough. I would not recommend doing this right before a major event or if you know you will be in water because from my experience, more layers continue to exfoliate after I thought it was done. This is a great product and I would recommend giving it a try. It really helped my deep cracks in my heels after a pedicure nightmare that even years of buffing couldn’t fix.
customer_reviews.author: Pgh shopper

customer_reviews.title: I tried several foot masks, so far this is the best!
customer_reviews.text: The best features are, I can wear sandals right after using it, and my feet peeled faster than with other products. Mostly peeled off after 1-2 days after I soaked my feet for 1 hour. I also used lots of lotion (regular Hempz body lotion) to soften my skin. The rest was all cleaned up in 5-6 days. I was able to wear flip flops even when my feet were peeling because the lotion kept them moisturized and the peeling barely showed.
customer_reviews.author: Hajnalka Cheek

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: With covid stopping my son and I from our monthly pedis, I was searching for something to help my feet in these adjusting times. I was skeptical at first, but 6 days in....booya! Not a pretty sight, but within 12 days my feet looked and felt incredible! As a personal trainer by day, I have been a mover with a moving company while gyms were closed. Either way, my feet need love. These wraps were heaven sent for my sandal loving girly moments! Definitely do this at least 14 days before you need to have socially acceptable feet....it takes a zombie apocalypse to reach onlyfans worthy feet!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Oddly effective and easy to do!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Followed the instructions and wore the booties for an hour. A couple days later and nothing was happening. But all of a sudden on the 4th day I started to see some skin peeling. Then on the 6th and 7th days it was really peeling! 9th day it was so smooth and awesome. Looks and feels a little weird for a few days but works. See images of my progress. Pack comes with 2 sets of booties so I think the price is pretty decent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hasse

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: I used as directed, my crusty feet peeled for about two weeks in big satisfying strips. My feet were sooo much better after using just once. I will prob do 2 more times to rid the roughness, but the roughness was immensely taken care of with just the first use. I would recommend, just be prepared to peel. They don't peel instantly either, mine started peeling in like 2 days. It was pretty cool haha.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! So weeks ahead of a trip, though!
customer_reviews.text: This really truly refreshed and revitalized my feet! It really did peel all of the dead skin. Some advice- do not peel dry skin off because it can pull skin that’s not ready yet and be painful. Also if you don’t need to peel on the top of your foot I’d put on a vaseline something first and don’t walk around while you have it on. My heel didn’t completely peel but the edges did and it looks amazing no more dry cracks! I’m still peeling 2 weeks later so do way in advance if you’re going on vacation or something.
customer_reviews.author: Eajoo

customer_reviews.title: It sorta worked, but not as well as the competition.
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty stoked when I saw the price and followed the instructions to a “t.” - I even soaked my feet in warm water every night after use for the best results. However, the results were meh compared to other brands I have tried. I will have to see after a couple weeks if the second pair in the box does any better so I can possibly bump the rating to four stars instead of three, but I was disappointed in the results being experienced in using different foot peels in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Mellor Family

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best foot peel I have ever tried! I was a little doubtful after reading some reviews but decided to try it anyway, it worked so well and I am on day 5, it started peeling on day 4. After putting them on my feet they felt really soft. My feet look way better, would highly recommend and buy again not only for me but my family. 5 stars!! 😀👌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Villa

customer_reviews.title: Not made for anyone with big feet.
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for me but not my husband. I’m a women’s size 8.5 and they fit perfectly. He’s a men’s size 13 and we couldn’t get them on al the way. They’re very messy and the tape that comes with is difficult to use. We wound up putting tight socks on over the bootie and sitting up with our feet flat on the floor to avoid leaks. My feet started peeling within 4 days. His feet didn’t peel at all even though I was able to get hALF his foot into the solution.
customer_reviews.author: Gtaylor

customer_reviews.title: From calloused feet 2 baby soft feet
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing I have horrible calluses on my feet. I've never liked shoes. I put these on My feet the time allotted and within a week my feet were baby soft. it is a must-try for those with hard calluses no scrubbing the callus just peels right off. I'm going to buy another pack to keep around so that I can do my feet when needed. I didn't experience no pain like trying to scrape them off it was wonderful
customer_reviews.author: maelee j.

customer_reviews.title: Not effective, feet won't look good
customer_reviews.text: So if you only want your arches to peel and the spaces between your toes to itch like mad by all means grab these. I used them exactly as directed, both times and they did basically nothing on my heels and the balls of my feet. I won't be wearing sandals for a while because my feet are just flaky and nasty enough from these to not want to show them in public. Just spend the money on a pedicure.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions then forgot about it. I was getting ready to take a shower one evening after about 3-4 days later and my feet were peeling like crazy. The skin under it was very soft. It took a few days for them to completely peel. Their advice about soaking your feet to help facilitate the peeling is sound advice. Doing it while taking a bath is another option. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ron S.

customer_reviews.title: YESSSSS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you're into gross things like feet pealing or pimple popping, then this is what you need!!! I have used this twice now ( once a year about) I usually do it at the end of summer so i can have baby soft feel again after all the damage I did to them during the hot summer days. I 100% peel off the dead skin and it is super satisfying! It does leave my feet super soft and looking good but the peeling is really the best part!!! you should totally buy this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product & was ASTOUNDED at the AMAZING results! I'd soaked the feet for an hour over the weekend and then forgot all about it, then days later I noticed huge chunks falling off my feet and then I was able to remove the dead skin in one gentle tug - it was as if I was removing 'socks made of dead skin'! Tickled at the toes, and it was 100% pain-free! Will definitely be gifting this item!
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great but make sure you soak your feet everyday like the instructions suggests. I didn’t soak my feet and my feet didn’t peel...but when I soak my feet my feet peeled like they were supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Feet ended up worse.... Unbearably dry and no peeling
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 2 stars because it looks like it worked for some people but it just made my feet worse :( I followed the directions... A week went by and my feet were so dry it was uncomfortable but zero peeling. So I tried it again like the box said I could after the week. Nothing but unbearably dry feet and some flaking on one foot. I thought this was the brand I used a few years ago that worked great but it's obviously not or they changed what's in the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: courtny

customer_reviews.title: I would give 500 stars for this product!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! I would give 500 stars! My feet are so clean and soft! It was kindda nasty for couple days when it was peeling off...it was peeled off little by little over 2 to 3 days, leaving the nasty dead skin trails every where I went. BUT AT LAST! I have my skin on my feet are like those on a newborn baby!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: The first peel made my feet peel Like crazy. Follow the instructions because soaking and moisturizing ...
customer_reviews.text: There's two peels per pack. The first peel made my feet peel Like crazy. Follow the instructions because soaking and moisturizing daily really helps the peeling. The second peel was just for some spots on my heels. Not as much peeling the second time which I expected. My feet are baby smooth!!!! Will definitely buy again! Telling everyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Meg O

customer_reviews.title: Peeling right on schedule!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, day 3, peeling on my toes...like clockwork! Hoping the rest of my foot follows suit. I noticed even right after using that my entire foot felt softer. I do not have bad calluses but my heels definitely needed attention. I'm trying to resist the urge to pull at the peeling skin! My toes are a little tender but I'm wearing flats with no socks so that probably doesn't help. We'll see how my feet look tomorrow. It's almost sandal season!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Better than other brands
customer_reviews.text: This product's really good. We tried on not so hard heels, cracked heels, etc. It peeled one layer off. If the crack is deep, it doesn't make it go away, but definitely better than scrubbing and saves time and effort. This peels the layers in larger pieces and not like powdery flakes. I tried a different brand for a lower price, which did peel a layer, but not the same way as this one. Other brands was peeling in tiny bits and pieces, which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jit

customer_reviews.title: Expected So Much More
customer_reviews.text: For the price I expected so much more. $17 price way too much to say that three weeks have passed and my feet still have places that need to peel. My foot looks like I have a skin disorder. The ones that I bought from Walmart worked better peeling completely off in a week or so not to mention I only paid $3. My daughter feet have not peeled at all.
customer_reviews.author: Danae

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bizarre experience to go through but I’m extremely happy with the outcome. When I say it’s bizarre, that’s due to the fact that the dead skin is shed during the process. I paid close attention to the excellent instructions and didn't exfoliate or scrub the skin while it’s falling off. The end result is great and worth the shedding time.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter1968

product_meta.title: Foot Peel Mask 2 Pack, Peeling Away Calluses and Dead Skin Cells, Make Your Feet Baby Soft, Exfoliating Foot Mask, Repair Rough Heels, Get Silky Soft Feet by Lavinso
product_meta.description:
The Lavinso Foot Peel Mask is an easy-to-use formula that’s designed to get rid of the hardened skin and dead cells, giving you soft baby feet once again.

 

How To Properly Use


 

 * Be sure to clean and dry your feet before applying the foot masks.
 * Use scissors to cut the seal on the foot masks.
 * Put foot mask on, pressing the mask’s outer layer as close as possible to the feet.
 * Tear the red double-sided film off on the inside and seal the opening.
 * Use cotton socks to keep the masks next to the skin while walking.
 * Remove foot masks 60-90 minutes later and rinse out and fully dry with a towel.
 * Keep your feet moist with a foot lotion.

 

Tips To Remember

 

 * Within four to seven days, the outer layers of your skin will fall off. You’re advised to soak your feet in warm water to exfoliate the dead skin.
 * After two weeks, the outer skin layers will all be gone, revealing baby-smooth skin feet.
 * Use only one time a month.
 * Individual results will vary.

 

Word of Caution

 

 * Product is designed for only external use
 * Pregnant or nursing women should not use this product
 * Never applied to damaged or irritated skin
 * Patch test required if the first use of this product.
 * If skin irritation occurs, stop using
 * Store away from children
 * Store in a cool location
feature_bullets: If you suffer from dry, cracked feet with callouses, then you want the best foot care treatment you can get that restores your feet to the smooth, soft feel you once had in as little as two weeks. If you’re unhappy with your purchase of our foot peel, we’ll provide you with a full refund.
Lavinso Foot Peel Mask comprises of all-natural ingredients and botanical extracts that are safe to use on both men and woman.

It’s never been easier to get amazing-looking feet. All you need to do is apply and allow the foot mask to work as it was designed to. You don’t need to scrub your foot, putting your feet through pain to get a baby soft smooth foot.
Just cut the booties to make a hole for your feet to slip into. Seal it back and use for an hour, so the product’s gel will moisturize and exfoliate your skin.
There are two foot peal mask booties in the package. You can use one treatment now and another for later use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
